text.section: If a Stream Restoration and Mitigation Authority undertakes a project that does not otherwise require development and submittal to a state or federal agency of a plan with standards and criteria for evaluating project success, the authority shall develop standards and criteria for evaluating the project's success. The authority shall include an account of the pilot projects findings in the report required under KRS 151.614(3).

law.history: Created 2008 Ky. Acts ch. 97, sec. 6, effective July 15, 2008.
